name: Apricot Amaranth Granola
description: Rolled oats. almonds, walnuts,Â puffed amaranth, hemp seeds, cinnamon, brown sugar, and apricots tossed with apple sauce and peanut butter and toasted until golden brown

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, walnuts, amaranth, hemp seeds, cinnamon, brown sugar, and apricots.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, walnuts, amaranth, hemp seeds, cinnamon, brown sugar, and apricots.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl whisk together the honey, apple sauce, and almond butter.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl whisk together the honey, apple sauce, and almond butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix by hand.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix by hand.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mixture on a sheet tray lined with parchment paper or a silpat.
recipeInstructions.name: Place mixture on a sheet tray lined with parchment paper or a silpat.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown. Stir granola after 10 minutes in the oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown. Stir granola after 10 minutes in the oven.

keywords: amaranth granola, baked granola, vegan granola
